name.ja: ブライトボール  Skill Game
name.th: บอลสดใส  Arcade Game

short.ar: Bright Ball هي لعبة أركيد نحاول فيها التسجيل عن طريق تحريك الكرات الملونة في حقل معد باستخدام نفس الألوان
short.am: ብራይት ኳስ በተመሳሳይ ቀለማት በተዘጋጀ ሜዳ ላይ ባለ ቀለም ኳሶችን በማንቀሳቀስ ጎል ለማስቆጠር የምንሞክርበት የመጫወቻ ማዕከል ጨዋታ ነው።
short.bg: Bright Ball е аркадна игра, в която се опитваме да отбележим, като местим цветните топки в поле, подготвено с помощта на същите…
short.bn: ব্রাইট বল হল একটি আর্কেড গেম যেখানে আমরা একই রঙ ব্যবহার করে প্রস্তুত মাঠে রঙিন বলগুলিকে সরিয়ে গোল করার চেষ্টা করি।
short.ca: Bright Ball és un joc arcade en el qual intentem puntuar movent les boles de colors en un camp preparat amb els mateixos colors.
short.cs: Bright Ball je arkádová hra, ve které se snažíme skórovat pohybem barevných míčků v poli připraveném pomocí stejných barev.
short.da: Bright Ball er et arkadespil, hvor vi forsøger at score ved at flytte de farvede bolde i et felt forberedt med de samme farver
short.de: Bright Ball ist ein Arcade-Spiel, bei dem wir versuchen, Punkte zu erzielen, indem wir die farbigen Kugeln in einem Feld bewegen,…
short.el: Το Bright Ball είναι ένα arcade παιχνίδι στο οποίο προσπαθούμε να σκοράρουμε μετακινώντας τις χρωματιστές μπάλες σε ένα πεδίο που…
short.en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es_419,lt,no,pt_BR,: Bright Ball is an arcade game in which we try to score by moving the colored balls in a field prepared using the same colors
short.es: Bright Ball es un juego arcade en el que tratamos de marcar moviendo las bolas de colores en un campo preparado con los mismos…
short.et: Bright Ball on arkaadmäng, milles proovime lüüa, liigutades värvilisi palle samu värve kasutades ettevalmistatud väljal.
short.fa: Bright Ball یک بازی آرکید است که در آن سعی می کنیم با حرکت دادن توپ های رنگی در زمینی که با همان رنگ ها آماده شده است، گلزنی کنیم.
short.fi: Bright Ball on arcade-peli, jossa yritämme tehdä maalin siirtämällä värillisiä palloja kentällä, joka on valmistettu samoilla…

short.fr: Bright Ball est un jeu d'arcade dans lequel nous essayons de marquer en déplaçant les boules colorées dans un champ préparé…
short.gu: બ્રાઇટ બોલ એ એક આર્કેડ ગેમ છે જેમાં આપણે સમાન રંગોનો ઉપયોગ કરીને તૈયાર કરેલ ક્ષેત્રમાં રંગીન દડાને ખસેડીને સ્કોર કરવાનો પ્રયાસ કરીએ…

short.id: Bright Ball adalah gim arkade di mana kami mencoba mencetak skor dengan menggerakkan bola-bola berwarna di lapangan yang disiapkan…
short.it: Bright Ball è un gioco arcade in cui cerchiamo di segnare muovendo le palline colorate in un campo preparato con gli stessi colori
short.ja: ブライトボールは、同じ色で用意されたフィールドで色付きのボールを動かして得点を目指すアーケードゲームです

short.ko: 브라이트볼은 같은 색으로 준비된 필드에서 색색의 공을 움직여 점수를 겨루는 아케이드 게임입니다.

short.uk: Bright Ball - це аркадна гра, в якій ми намагаємося забити, переміщаючи кольорові кульки в полі, підготовленому з використанням тих…

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Bright Ball is an arcade game in which we try to score by moving the colored balls in a field prepared using the same colors.
There is an area in the game which include various colors. We can control this area. There is a ball that changes color in the area that we can control. We get points by adjusting the size according to the color of this Ball. We continue the game by maintaining our high score goal with the points we have achieved. Shiny Ball has emerged as a fun skill game designed for us who love children's games.

To swipe Install this extension to play the Bright Ball Game or offline with no additional downloads and no ads. 

You can contact us at support@724fun.com and share your thoughts and problems

After clicking the add the game to chrome button, you can find the game in the extensions section. If you wish, you can visit 724fun.com. If you wish, you can play again and if you want to remove it, you can remove it from the extensions section.
